name: WESTERN REGIONAL ROAD CORRIDOR INVESTMENT PROGRAM - TRANCHE 2
info: The components composed of: (i) 103.9 km of paved road constructed between Khovd and Khashaatin Davaa pass; (ii) two bridges (0.304 km) and 10 im of urban roads constructed in Khovd; (iii) one road maintenance center established and equipped with staff trained; and (iv) project management, consulting services and capacity developmnt for maintenance planning, civil works, and procurement.
